statements: DELETE FROM DemandForecastingData WHERE forecast_id = 100 AND product_id = 1;
DELETE FROM DemandForecastingData WHERE production_scheduling_id = 500 AND demand_quantity = 50;
DELETE FROM demand_forecasting_data WHERE forecast_date < '2022-01-01' AND forecasted_demand < 1000;
DELETE FROM production_scheduling WHERE production_quantity = 500 AND production_date > '2022-02-01';
DELETE FROM production_scheduling WHERE production_line = 'Line A';
DELETE FROM demand_forecasting_data WHERE forecasted_demand < 1000 AND forecasted_date < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM production_scheduling WHERE production_quantity > 5000 AND production_date > '2022-06-01';
